storyInfo: News of Infected taking a surprise turn for the better comes out of the Afterglow, a district of Vyseheim, Leithanien, where Hibiscus arrives to investigate. Coinciding with famed musician Czerny's farewell concert holding its selections, the noble youth Ebenholz and the wandering Kreide apply to participate in the occasion.

attributes.text:
'The Sky is blue and fine,
The Breeze lilts by in Song;
The River murmurs clear,
My Heart is filled with Hope.
The Mist parts overnight,
The Earth welcomes Dawn's Light;
Praise be Leithanien,
Where free Men find their Home.'
â€”Lied des klaren Himmels (1078)

attributes.content: (According to the map, I shouldn't be far from the Rhodes Island branch office now.)
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: (Got held up a bit coming into Vyseheim, but if I just hurry up, I can hopefully make it there before I'm late...)
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Hold it right there!
attributes.name: Passionate Infected

attributes.content: Er... me?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Yes indeed, you, beautiful Dame! You're an unfamiliar face. Could this be your first time here in the Afterglow?
attributes.name: Passionate Infected

attributes.content: Yes, I'm a Rhodes Island Operator, here to look into the Serendipitous Infected Prognosis Phenomenonâ€”
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Leave behind your work and duties for now. I cordially invite you here to perform with me in song!
attributes.name: Passionate Infected

attributes.content: Perform?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: But I bought this concert flute as a staff. I couldn't play you a single song...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: No matter! If you can just make it sing, I have faith I can spin your notes into a song to offer to you, Dame. Let's commemorate this fine day!
attributes.name: Passionate Infected

attributes.content: I have an appointment with someone, and I'm almost late as is.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Don't worry, don't worry. Anyone would let a little delay go, with weather so fine.
attributes.name: Passionate Infected

attributes.content: Come, this won't take long!
attributes.name: Passionate Infected

attributes.content: I... I just play some random notes then?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Please!
attributes.name: Passionate Infected

attributes.content: (Alright, alright, I can make it sound...)
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Do... fa... la.. so... fa... mi...
attributes.name: Passionate Infected

attributes.content: Wonderful, a motif full with hope!
attributes.name: Passionate Infected

attributes.content: Emma, I'll play. What if you and our visitor dance a tune together?
attributes.name: Passionate Infected

attributes.content: Together?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Come, beautiful FrÃ¤ulein, let us skip!
attributes.name: Cheerful Infected

attributes.content: But I really don't have the time, and I'm not much of a dancâ€”
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: No worries, we all dance poorly at times. No one will laugh at you.
attributes.name: Cheerful Infected

attributes.content: Very well, I'll play this in three...
attributes.name: Passionate Infected

attributes.content: One-two-three, one-two-three... readyâ€”go!
attributes.name: Passionate Infected

attributes.content: I'm sorry, I trod on you so many...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: That's fine, I'm delighted to dance with you! Thank you for joining us!
attributes.name: Cheerful Infected

attributes.content: Goodbye! Have a beautiful day!
attributes.name: Passionate Infected

attributes.content: Welcome to the Afterglow!
attributes.name: Cheerful Infected

attributes.content: Thank you, thanks.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Good morning, Hibiscus~
attributes.name: Woman in Operator Attire

attributes.content: You're... Andante? From the branch?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: That's right! Welcome to Vyseheim's Afterglow!
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Thank you. This is awkward, you coming out here just to greet me.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I didn't come just to greet you.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Eh?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Word came that before you left for the Afterglow, you were piling pressure on yourself, staying up all hours of every night. You were reading papers right up until you left the landship.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: So today, your job is entirely to relax!
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: I'm actually fine.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: No, can't have that! Strings snap when you stretch them that thin!
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Besides, you came just at the right time. Herr Czerny's farewell concert is in a week, and it just so happens today's application day.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Apparently, he's performing at the plaza in front of Afterglow Hall! It'll be over if we're a moment too late!
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: But the mission...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: If this chance goes, it's gone! We can talk missions tomorrow! Let's run!
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: We're here!
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Afterglow Hall. They say it's this very concert hall the Afterglow gets its name from.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Is... this even a building, or is it a giant instrument...?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Enough, the Hall's not going anywhere, we'll have time to admire it later. Our focus today is Herr Czerny.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: I think... I read about Mister, Herr Czerny beforehand. He was born in the Afterglow?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: He was. He's still the one and only musician ever to both be Infected and renowned in Leithanien. He's even held minor tours around the countryâ€”
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: I see him, there he is!
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: The musician stands on the steps outside the hall, a colossal instrument his height upright beside him.
No one stands in the five-meter semicircle around him.
Outside that semicircle, the crowds teem.
Blow me down! Half of the Afterglow's here, at least.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Half?!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Herr Czerny used to constantly perform outdoors here, but he's been ill for half a year, and it's his first time back. You don't know how excited everyone isâ€”
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: (Whisper) It's starting.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: With the sound of a piano, the plaza quickly falls to a hush.
Practically everyone stops talking.
Even the peddler hawking incessantly until now lowers his voice.
The song is short.
The moment Czerny's performance ends, a mountainous applause erupts.
It gradually abates. While Czerny prepares to play the next song, someone neatly dressed squeezes through the crowd, and arrives at his side.
Herr Czerny, Dame Gertrude sends her regards.
attributes.name: Frivolous Noble

attributes.content: Oh. You, I see.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: She asks me to remind you that be it an applicational affair or the concert day itself, you haven't been booked for an outdoor performance.
attributes.name: Frivolous Noble

attributes.content: And what does it matter?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Other places may have their schedules, but you are hard-pressed to stop me performing for all in the Afterglow.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Your health isn't the fairest. You'd best not tire yourself too much...
attributes.name: Frivolous Noble

attributes.content: I know my health best. If I didn't feel better today, I wouldn't be here.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Go tell Gertrude: mind her own business. Don't come all persnickety at me.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Frivolous Noble

attributes.content: What was his problem? Why did no one say anything?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: He's a retainer of Dame Gertrude Strollo.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Gertrude Strollo... Countess Strollo, the ruler... the Lehnsfrau of Vyseheim?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: The very same.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: But Herr Czerny sent that man packing in just a few words! What a feel-good sight.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: I see.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Let's head into Afterglow Hall in a moment. Application's about to begin.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Seeing the noble's figure disappear into the crowd, Czerny clears his throat.
Thank you all for your support.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Today, I came not just to play you all a passage or two, long while that it's been, but to warm up for the concert next week.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I invite you all to be enthusiastic in this application. Prove your love for music on the stage. I'll be here, supporting you all.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I'll be at the selections tomorrow too, casting my own discerning eye.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Now, let me play a few more pieces for you all. I welcome you to bring out whatever instruments you're good with. Whether you accompany me or play by your own tune, I welcome it all.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Thank you, everyone!
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Czerny bows, the heavy silence finally lifts, and the crowd erupts into even more fervorous applause.
Hey. You set up shop here too?
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: Damn near everyone's here at the Hall. Where else am I going to do business if not here?
attributes.name: Coffee Shop Owner

attributes.content: Sure, but I don't think anyone's willing to drink your coffee.
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: Easy for you to sayâ€”
attributes.name: Coffee Shop Owner

attributes.content: Excuse me, I'll take a tub of sauerkraut. A big one!
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Coming up!
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: A crowd full of anticipation, a musician forcing his ailing body along, a noble given the cold shoulder...
attributes.name: Coffee Shop Owner

attributes.content: (Whisper) Touches my heart.
attributes.name: Coffee Shop Owner

attributes.content: Kreide. You still insist on applying to that concert?
attributes.name: Disgruntled Old Man

attributes.content: Yes, I do want to go...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Fine. Don't often see you turning a deaf ear like this. You want to go, go.
attributes.name: Disgruntled Old Man

attributes.content: Thank you, Grandpa!
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: You sign up and come straight back, don't linger outside.
attributes.name: Grandpa

attributes.content: I'll try.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Try?
attributes.name: Grandpa

attributes.content: Apparently, entrants have to perform onstage for this application, so they can prove their skill...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: But your cello's been wrecked forever. You only have the one string to play. What are you doing about that?
attributes.name: Grandpa

attributes.content: It's alright, they'll provide a loaner instrument.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: *sigh* Very, very thoughtful of them. Why did nobody tell me, hm?
attributes.name: Grandpa

attributes.content: Grandpa, are you... mad?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: What? No, I'm just a little uneasy about it.
attributes.name: Grandpa

attributes.content: I promise, I'll be back as soon as the application's over. I won't run off anywhere!
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Fine, fine, I hear you.
attributes.name: Grandpa

attributes.content: I'll put the tea by the stove, now. Remember to drink it soon, don't let it get cold!
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Application's beginning soon. It's about time you went.
attributes.name: Mature Noble

attributes.content: I still can't swallow this. You called me here, all the way from Urtica, specifically to have me apply to this concert full of Infected?
attributes.name: Young Noble

attributes.content: Such a level of interaction with Infected won't pose any risk.
attributes.name: Mature Noble

attributes.content: You don't have to tell me. I know.
attributes.name: Young Noble

attributes.content: What I mean to say is, I don't understand why you invited me here just for some run-of-the-mill concert.
attributes.name: Young Noble

attributes.content: You've always wanted to breathe the air of freedom, haven't you?
attributes.name: Mature Noble

attributes.content: I can't deny that, butâ€”
attributes.name: Young Noble

attributes.content: Don't let doubts overtake you now. Enjoy the commoners' festive atmosphere.
attributes.name: Mature Noble

attributes.content: (Shrug)
attributes.name: Young Noble

attributes.content: The car is ready for you. There's some way to travel from the Cliffy Patio to the Afterglow; I recommend you not go on foot, so as not to affect your performance at application.
attributes.name: Mature Noble

attributes.content: I appreciate your kindness. Farewell, Strolloâ€”
attributes.name: Young Noble

attributes.content: You're forgetting. I prefer my given name, not my surname.
attributes.name: Mature Noble

attributes.content: I apologize, Dame Gertrude.
attributes.name: Young Noble

attributes.content: What a queue!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: That's the line for application. We're just going with the crowds, so come this way~
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Hello, can I ask...?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Here to apply, right? End of the line's there. Head over and queue up.
attributes.name: Worn-out Infected

attributes.content: â€”It's so long!
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Plenty of folk started queueing before the sun came up.
attributes.name: Worn-out Infected

attributes.content: But I'm really in a rush to get my application over with. I'm still caring for my grandpa back home.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: No can do. Look, we're all Afterglowers. Who hasn't got someone to care for at home?
attributes.name: Worn-out Infected

attributes.content: Well... but...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Get in line, quick. It'll be even longer soon enough.
attributes.name: Worn-out Infected

attributes.content: Can you really not accommodate, just this once?
attributes.name: Young Noble

attributes.content: I said no. That's justâ€”
attributes.name: Worn-out Infected

attributes.content: Wait, yâ€”you're a noble, aren't you? You're here to apply to our concert?!
attributes.name: Worn-out Infected

attributes.content: If you see as much, then could you oblige myself and my friend here?
attributes.name: Young Noble

attributes.content: But we've got rules...
attributes.name: Worn-out Infected

attributes.content: Or do you plan to refuse a noble's sincerest request?
attributes.name: Young Noble

attributes.content: I wouldn't dare.
attributes.name: Worn-out Infected

attributes.content: Thank you for your understanding.
attributes.name: Young Noble

attributes.content: Come, now.
attributes.name: Young Noble

attributes.content: Didn't you hear me? They're letting us through.
attributes.name: Young Noble

attributes.content: A... Alright!
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Butâ€”
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Er, where'd he go?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Next, please.
attributes.name: Mannered Infected

attributes.content: Can I have your name, please?
attributes.name: Mannered Infected

attributes.content: People call me Kreide.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: What instruments are you proficient in?
attributes.name: Mannered Infected

attributes.content: The cello.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Did you come without your own cello?
attributes.name: Mannered Infected

attributes.content: I don't have one...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: That's fine, we provide common-use instruments to musicians. You can access them at your leisure.
attributes.name: Mannered Infected

attributes.content: Alright, you may begin. Be careful not to go over one minute.
attributes.name: Mannered Infected

attributes.content: Is there a problem?
attributes.name: Mannered Infected

attributes.content: I didn't get to ask just now, but how do you determine pay for participation?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Pay?
attributes.name: Mannered Infected

attributes.content: Eh?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: The person who told me about the concert said that so long as I was chosen, I'd get ample pay.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: My grandpa's gravely ill, and I need money for his treatment.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: I sympathize with your plight, but there is no material reward for this concert.
attributes.name: Mannered Infected

attributes.content: There's no pay at all?!
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: I believe the vast majority feel that the ultimate honorarium comes from performing with Herr Czerny at his farewell concert.
attributes.name: Mannered Infected

attributes.content: How could this be...?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: It's your decision to perform or not. However, if you do decide to leave, I hope for you to at least leave us with a fine melody before you do.
attributes.name: Mannered Infected

attributes.content: I... alright.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Kreide, somewhat dejectedly, bows.
He slowly takes a seat, and steadies the cello between his knees.
With a hand on his bow, and the other on the strings, the dismay is all but swept from his face, leaving only concentration.
From the cello's strings flows an ornate melody, gradually filling the whole hall.
After a number of bars, Kreide's performance reaches its sweetest point, when a concert flute joins from below the stage out of nowhere.
The noble in black plays the flute, accompanying Kreide's cello, and he paces his way onto the stage.
Kreide is briefly startled, but nevertheless concludes the passage with his own cadence, while the noble follows the cello's ending with his own, briefest cadenza.
And that's one minute.
attributes.name: Mannered Infected

attributes.content: That was the most beautiful performance I've heard today.
attributes.name: Mannered Infected

attributes.content: I feel we should pay our respects to both you young men.
attributes.name: Mannered Infected

attributes.content: Are you here to apply to this concert too?
attributes.name: Mannered Infected

attributes.content: The very same.
attributes.name: Young Noble

attributes.content: I was planning to do so alone, but professedly, Herr Kreide's performance struck me deep, and I did happen to meet him earlier.
attributes.name: Young Noble

attributes.content: I was loath to miss a chance to perform with such a superb instrumentalist.
attributes.name: Young Noble

attributes.content: Understood. May I have your name?
attributes.name: Mannered Infected

attributes.content: Ebenholz.
attributes.name: Young Noble

attributes.content: To have someone like y... Ebenholz?
attributes.name: Mannered Infected

attributes.content: Are you certain? Your real name is Ebenholz? That's not an alias you just came up with after staring at the piano?
attributes.name: Mannered Infected

attributes.content: You really are too mistrustful.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Besides, a piano isn't the only thing with keys. Does a flute not have them too?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Even so, your lineage and estateâ€”
attributes.name: Mannered Infected

attributes.content: I'll say again, my name is Ebenholz. Do you have any other questions?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Mannered Infected

attributes.content: That said, since you and Herr Kreide brought no agreement on whether to apply as an ensemble, the decision lies with him.
attributes.name: Mannered Infected

attributes.content: Herr Kreide, what do you feel?
attributes.name: Mannered Infected

attributes.content: I was only applying to this concert... for my grandpa's medical fees...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Should Kreide assent to an ensemble, I'd be very willing to provide him and his grandfather economic assistance.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: â€”Really?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: That kind of aid doesn't come without strings attached. Make sure you're completely clear about this.
attributes.name: Mannered Infected

attributes.content: We saw a musician swindled last year. He signed an extremely unfair contract...
attributes.name: Mannered Infected

attributes.content: Please, I ask for some respect.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I'll do it!
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Then I'll leave it at that.
attributes.name: Mannered Infected

attributes.content: If the two of you are entering the selections as flute and cello, then the one choice you have is 'Morgen und Abend.'
attributes.name: Mannered Infected

attributes.content: It's a duet for flute and cello with piano accompaniment, and one of Herr Czerny's signature works. Are you okay with that?
attributes.name: Mannered Infected

attributes.content: Said piece marked a turning point in my learning flute. I'm extraordinarily honored that I may perform it on Herr Czerny's stage.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I'm fine with it, too!
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Why is that noble helping Kreide?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: A lot of musicians have nobles as backers. Nothing strange about it.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Some do it because they're not good enough themselves, so they see a really skilled musician and leap for them. They like how it makes them look better all around.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: I can't figure out this Ebenholz either, though. Maybe he is just appreciating a fellow maestro.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Something still doesn't sit too well with me.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Oh, we could treat Kreide's grandpaâ€”
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Hibiscus, you were here to investigate the Serendipitous Infected Prognosis Phenomenon, weren't you?
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Erk.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: And our branch is too small. We don't have what it takes to admit patients like a hospital.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Examinations, diagnoses, prescriptions for milder cases, getting patients in touch with other organizations when they need hospitalizationâ€”that's our limit.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: But I'm still a little worried.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: In that case... Kreide's application is over, anyhow. Let's go catch up and ask him, see if we can offer him any help, okay?
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Test results are in. Cell-Originium Assimilation is 8%, Blood Originium-Crystal Density is 0.23u/L... I can't say it's too severe, but it's not good by any stretch.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Typically, any patient should receive standard treatment with indicators at this level, no matter how they feel themselves. I suggest hospitalized recovery.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Standard treatment, hospitalized recovery...
attributes.name: Grandpa

attributes.content: I hear Rhodes Island is just as much a business. You might be pitying me, giving me the test with no charge, but there's no such thing as a free lunch for me, eh?
attributes.name: Grandpa

attributes.content: We're partnered with some organizations in Vyseheim. We can refer patients to them.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: They have collaborative protocols in place with Rhodes Island. The prices will be cheaper compared to anywhere else.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Given your present circumstances, I can try to talk down their fees further, or I could help offset expenses on both sides...
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: No need.
attributes.name: Grandpa

attributes.content: If I knew Kreide was only going for my sake, I wouldn't have let him go, no matter what.
attributes.name: Grandpa

attributes.content: Kreide. I'll say it again. You return every last cent to that noble. We're going.
attributes.name: Grandpa

attributes.content: What could possibly be happening behind you when an aristocrat gives you money for no good reason?
attributes.name: Grandpa

attributes.content: But Ebenholz just wants me to perform with him.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Even if he means no harm, heâ€”
attributes.name: Grandpa

attributes.content: *sigh* He might mean no harm, and an old man like me totting about without any grand standing or friend in power won't be worth much to exploit.
attributes.name: Grandpa

attributes.content: The hospitals still wouldn't be angels to me, even if they do admit me. I don't want my life depending on their whimsy.
attributes.name: Grandpa

attributes.content: If you see a heart of gold in that little lord, then use that money for your own sake. Do some business that lets you get on with your life.
attributes.name: Grandpa

attributes.content: No. I already agreed with Ebenholz. The money he gives me is for treating your sickness!
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: You're tired of me. Throwing me into hospital so you can never look back, isn't that right?
attributes.name: Grandpa

attributes.content: What? How could I...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: How about he convalesces here, instead of going to any partners?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Hibiscus, I understand how you feel... but we don't have beds here, and our medication stores are for emergency response.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: If we can have him recovering here, we'll be able to monitor his health condition more tightly. I'm sure it'd be of help to our investigation too.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I can clear my own guest bed for him to take. Medication-wise, we'll sell at our partners' prices. I'll write a report after the fact explaining the situation.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: That should all be watertight under procedure, right?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I think... that works out.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Then we're all good to go on our end. Sir, how about you? Are you able to accept that?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I guarantee, your treatment will be highest priority for us. All research propositions will hinge on informed consent, and we'll never commit to anything harmful to your health.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I agree!
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: And I have to rehearse with Ebenholz soon, too. I might not have too much time to look after you.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Besides, conditions here are so much better than at home. If you're here, I can put my heart at ease too... please, Grandpa!
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: *sigh*.
attributes.name: Grandpa

attributes.content: I'll go home this evening to pack some things. I'll be back tomorrow morning. You'll let me have that much, won't you?
attributes.name: Grandpa
